messages.title: For the many, not the few
messages.content: A decade of cuts has damaged our economy, our communities, and our public services. Labour stands for the real change Britain needs.

messages.title: VOTE FOR HOPE
messages.content: A decade of cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and our public services. Whether it’s fighting to end the bedroom tax or campaigning for a living wage to 16: Labour is always fighting to create a more fair and equal society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Always campaign to Remain because remaining in the EU is the best deal for Putney, Roehampton and Southfields.
Implement a Green New Deal to cut carbon emissions to zero by 2030.
End privatisation of our NHS and invest in new hospitals and doctors.
Labour will build more decent and genuinely affordable homes to buy and rent, and offer more help for first-time buyers.
Provide a fully-funded Youth Service and increase the number of police on our streets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This is a two-horse race – only Labour or the Conservatives can win here. Make sure your vote counts.

issues.economy: A decade of cuts has damaged our economy.
issues.environment: Stop the climate crisis. Implement a Green New Deal to cut carbon emissions to zero by 2030.
issues.governance: Labour will give people control, putting power into communities over purchases. End privatisation of our NHS.
issues.health: Save the NHS. End privatisation of our NHS and invest in new hospitals and doctors.

housing.content: Labour will build more decent and genuinely affordable homes to buy and rent, and offer more help for first-time buyers.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ll always stand up for everyone in our community. I’ll fight to protect our NHS and vital public services. I’ll always campaign to Remain.

quotes.text: Labour will give people control, putting power into communities over purchases.
People have had enough of rip-off energy and water companies, and extortionate rail fares.
You can trust Labour with our NHS - our proudest achievement, providing universal healthcare on the basis of need, free at the point of use. We won't let Donald Trump get his hands on it.

images.caption: Fleur Anderson with residents and activists.
Fleur Anderson standing by a busy street.
